bibl.title: A Note on 'Ineditum Campioneum Nottinghamense'.
bibl.note: Corrected reading of a Greek inscription published by: Fritz M. Heichelheim, Ineditum Campioneum Nottinghamense, JEA 30 (1944) pp. 76-77 (= S.B. VIII, 9877; S.E.G. XVIII, 720). [La même correction a été faite par: W.R. Chalmers, JEA 42 (1956) pp. 123-124, 1 fig.]
bibl.seg: Ray J.D., A Note on 'Ineditum Campioneum Nottinghamense'.
